text: Baby Darling Taporo is the fourth studio album by the neofolk duo Ruby Throat. It was released on CD on 9 November 2017, and is due for a digital release on 2 March 2018. ==Recording== The album was recorded by vocalist KatieJane Garside and guitarist Chris Wittingham during a voyage around the Marquesas Islands, Niue, Kingdom of Tonga, New Zealand, Saint Helena, and the Azores. ==Release== Baby Darling Taporo is due for release 2 March 2018 on digital, as well as a limited 500-CD-pressing, which Garside began selling on her official website on 9 November 2017. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== *Baby Darling Taporo at Rate Your Music Category:2017 albums
title: Baby Darling Taporo
